mapper.select: /* FrontAchieveDAO.selectAchieveList*/ select acv.acv_id , acv.acv_name , count(acv.qst_id) as qst_cnt , count(acv.ans_value) as ans_cnt from ( select aa.acv_id , aa.acv_name , aq.qst_id , ama.ans_value from cb_aigo_achievement as aa inner join cb_aigo_question as aq on aq.sub_id = #{subId} and aq.lev_id = #{levId} and aa.lev_id = aq.lev_id and aa.sub_id = aq.sub_id and aa.acv_id = aq.acv_id left join cb_aigo_my_answer_list as ama on ama.mem_id = #{memId} and aq.qst_id = ama.qst_id and ama.ans_value is not null ) as acv group by acv.acv_id, acv.acv_name

/* FrontAchieveDAO.selectAchieveDetail*/ select a.acv_name, a.acv_text, a.acv_id from cb_aigo_achievement a, cb_aigo_notion b where a.acv_id = b.acv_id and a.use_yn ='Y' and b.use_yn = 'Y' and a.acv_id = #{acvId}
